SEARCH
Package repository.impl

Class CsvStudentRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.impl.CsvStudentRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<Student,String>, StudentRepository
@Repository public class CsvStudentRepository extends Object implements StudentRepository
CSV-based implementation of StudentRepository. Maintains in-memory cache with periodic sync to CSV file. Thread-safe implementation using read-write locks.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6
